#summary Compatible weather stations.

= Introduction =

The EasyWeather PC-application is used to check compatibility.


= Details =

The EasyWeather application available from the Fine Offset Electronic's web site is able to read weather data from all weather stations compatible with fowsr:

http://www.foshk.com/en/products/show.asp?id=42

If the EasyWeather application can read your weather station, then the foswr application will work. The EasyWeather software is also needed to configure the weather station's read interval and time zone.
